recipes.aio::put_file: Uploads a file to an S3 bucket
recipes.aio::get_file: Retrieves a file from an S3 bucket

long_description:
= DESCRIPTION:

Recipes for working with S3 buckets

= REQUIREMENTS:


= ATTRIBUTES: 

See metadata.rb

= USAGE:

Designed to be run within a RightScale ServerTemplate


# download a a file from S3 using the :get provider
win_aws_powershell_s3providers "downloadmyfile" do
  access_key_id @node[:aws][:access_key_id]
  secret_access_key @node[:aws][:secret_access_key]
  s3_bucket @node[:s3][:bucket]
  s3_file @node[:s3][:file]
  download_dir 'c:'
  action :get
end
name: aio
license:

aio/download_dir.description: The directory where the file from s3 will be downloaded. Ex: c:\tmp\

s3/bucket.description: The name of the S3 bucket

aio/file_path.description: The full path to the file to be uploaded. Ex: c:\tmp\my.txt

aws/access_key_id.description: This is an Amazon credential. Log in to your AWS account at aws.amazon.com to retrieve you access identifiers. Ex: 1JHQQ4KVEVM02KVEVM02

s3/file.description: Name of the file on s3. When ignored, it will use the name in the File Path

aws/secret_access_key.description: This is an Amazon credential.  Log in to your AWS account at aws.amazon.com to retrieve your access identifiers. Ex: XVdxPgOM4auGcMlPz61IZGotpr9LzzI07tT8s2Ws
